name: Minimal Empty Side
description: A sleek and minimalist side chair, perfect for modern spaces. Its clean lines and neutral tones make it a versatile piece for any room.

name: Rustic Oak Side
description: Crafted from solid oak, this rustic side chair brings warmth and character to your home. Its sturdy design makes it both stylish and functional.

name: Mid-Century Modern
description: Inspired by mid-century design, this chair features a curved wooden backrest and comfortable cushioning, ideal for both dining and lounging.

name: Industrial Metal Frame
description: This industrial-style side chair combines a metal frame with a distressed leather seat, offering a rugged yet refined look for any space.

name: Classic Upholstered
description: Featuring soft upholstery and a tufted back, this classic side chair provides comfort and elegance, perfect for dining or as an accent chair.

name: Scandinavian Wooden
description: A Scandinavian-inspired wooden side chair with a minimalist design. Its natural wood finish and ergonomic shape offer both comfort and style.

name: Contemporary Leather
description: This sleek contemporary lounge chair features a leather finish with a stainless steel frame. Ideal for modern living rooms or office spaces, combining style and comfort.

name: Scandinavian Fabric
description: A minimalist Scandinavian design with soft fabric upholstery and a natural wooden frame. Perfect for adding a touch of warmth to any room.

name: Classic Wingback Lounge
description: A timeless classic, this wingback lounge chair is upholstered in premium fabric with deep cushioning, ideal for reading nooks or living rooms.

name: Mid-Century Modern
description: This mid-century modern lounge chair features smooth lines, wooden legs, and a rich fabric finish. A perfect blend of vintage charm and modern elegance.

name: Luxury Velvet Lounge
description: With soft velvet upholstery and a deep seat, this luxurious lounge chair adds a touch of sophistication to any living space.

name: Bohemian Wicker Lounge
description: Crafted from natural wicker, this bohemian-inspired lounge chair brings a laid-back and earthy vibe to any indoor or outdoor setting.
